Boston.South Bay Harbor Trail: The South Bay Harbor Trail is a mixed-use path in Boston, Massachusetts. Construction began in 2008, and was originally expected to be completed in 2010, but was delayed until 2011. The trail extends from Ruggles Station along Melnea Cass Boulevard, across Massachusetts Avenue, along Biosquare Drive near the Massachusetts Avenue Connector, under the Southeast Expressway (Interstate 93), and connects with the Boston Harborwalk in Rolling Bridge Park on Fort Point Channel.
